body_html: I think that since einsum is the only case where we could possibly need this (at least for now), then we should just have a special case in our code (perhaps add a new type to PythonArgParser, that would be handled specially). Making all other places pay the complexity for a quite exotic case is not good.

body: I think that since einsum is the only case where we could possibly need this (at least for now), then we should just have a special case in our code (perhaps add a new type to PythonArgParser, that would be handled specially). Making all other places pay the complexity for a quite exotic case is not good.
